title: Edelweiss, Phoenix among ARCs vying for IOB's Rs 13,472-crore NPAs
description: Edelweiss ARC, Phoenix ARC, Omkara ARC, and Prudent ARC eye Indian Overseas Bank's loan portfolio. Sets with reserve prices. ARCs conduct due diligence. Bank reports lower non-performing Assets.
